herbs.name: Turmeric
advantages: Contains curcumin, which has potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.
May help with arthritis, digestive disorders, and cognitive function.

herbs.name: Ginger
advantages: Effective for reducing nausea, aiding digestion, and decreasing inflammation.
May also help with osteoarthritis and muscle pain.

herbs.name: Garlic
advantages: Contains allicin, which can help lower blood pressure, reduce cholesterol levels, and support immune function.
Has antibacterial and antiviral properties.

herbs.name: Peppermint
advantages: Known for its soothing effects on the digestive system.
Can relieve symptoms of irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), indigestion, and headaches.

herbs.name: Chamomile
advantages: Has calming effects that can help with anxiety, insomnia, and digestive issues.
Has mild anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

herbs.name: Lavender
advantages: Used for its relaxing and anxiety-reducing effects.
May also help with insomnia and minor skin irritations.

herbs.name: Echinacea
advantages: Often used to boost the immune system.
May help reduce the duration and severity of colds and respiratory infections.

herbs.name: Thyme
advantages: Has antimicrobial and expectorant properties.
Useful for respiratory issues like coughs and bronchitis.
Supports digestion.

herbs.name: Rosemary
advantages: Contains antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds.
May help improve memory, support digestion, and relieve muscle pain.

herbs.name: Sage
advantages: Known for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.
Can help with digestive problems and improve cognitive function.
May also support oral health.

herbs.name: Cilantro (Coriander)
advantages: Supports digestion and helps with detoxification.
May also have antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory effects.

herbs.name: Dandelion
advantages: Known for its diuretic properties.
Can support liver health, aid digestion, and help with fluid retention.

herbs.name: Fennel
advantages: Helps with digestive issues such as bloating and gas.
Has been used to support respiratory health and reduce inflammation.

herbs.name: Milk Thistle
advantages: Contains silymarin, which supports liver health and detoxification.
May help protect the liver from damage and support overall liver function.

herbs.name: Oregano
advantages: Has antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidant properties.
Can support immune health and help with digestive issues.

herbs.name: Lemon Balm
advantages: Known for its calming effects.
Can help with anxiety, insomnia, and digestive discomfort.

herbs.name: Ashwagandha
advantages: An adaptogen that helps the body manage stress.
May also support adrenal function, improve energy levels, and aid in sleep.

herbs.name: Holy Basil (Tulsi)
advantages: Known for its adaptogenic properties.
Helps the body cope with stress.
Has anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and antimicrobial effects.

herbs.name: Marshmallow Root
advantages: Contains mucilage that soothes the digestive tract and respiratory system.
Used for coughs, sore throats, and digestive inflammation.

herbs.name: Nettle
advantages: Rich in nutrients.
Can help with allergies, support joint health, and improve urinary tract function.

herbs.name: Ginseng
advantages: Known for its adaptogenic properties.
Can help improve energy, reduce stress, and support immune function.

herbs.name: Licorice Root
advantages: Used to soothe gastrointestinal issues and respiratory conditions.
Has anti-inflammatory and antiviral properties.
Should be used cautiously as it can affect blood pressure.

herbs.name: Elderberry
advantages: Rich in antioxidants.
Can support the immune system and help reduce the duration and severity of colds and flu.

herbs.name: Hibiscus
advantages: Contains antioxidants.
Can help lower blood pressure, support heart health, and improve cholesterol levels.

herbs.name: Hawthorn
advantages: Supports cardiovascular health.
Helps with symptoms of heart disease and improves circulation.

herbs.name: Fenugreek
advantages: May help with blood sugar regulation.
Supports digestion and has anti-inflammatory properties.

herbs.name: Angelica
advantages: Used traditionally to aid digestion.
Relieves menstrual discomfort and supports respiratory health.

herbs.name: Basil
advantages: Contains antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds.
May help with digestive issues and support overall health.

herbs.name: Catnip
advantages: Known for its calming effects.
Can help with anxiety, insomnia, and digestive discomfort.

herbs.name: Cinnamon
advantages: Contains antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties.
May help regulate blood sugar levels and support heart health.

herbs.name: Dill
advantages: Supports digestion.
Reduces bloating and has antimicrobial properties.

herbs.name: Gotu Kola
advantages: Promotes cognitive function.
Supports skin health and aids in wound healing.

herbs.name: Kava
advantages: Known for its calming and anxiety-reducing effects.
May also aid in improving sleep and relaxation.

herbs.name: Motherwort
advantages: Traditionally used for menstrual and menopausal symptoms.
May also support heart health and reduce anxiety.

herbs.name: Red Clover
advantages: Supports hormonal balance.
Aids in menopausal symptoms and has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

herbs.name: Rooibos
advantages: Contains antioxidants.
May help with digestion, support skin health, and reduce the risk of certain chronic diseases.

herbs.name: Sarsaparilla
advantages: Traditionally used to support skin health.
Helps detoxify the body and relieve arthritis symptoms.

herbs.name: Slippery Elm
advantages: Contains mucilage that soothes the digestive tract.
Can help with sore throats, ulcers, and digestive discomfort.

herbs.name: Yarrow
advantages: Known for its anti-inflammatory and wound-healing properties.
Can help with digestive issues, reduce fevers, and support the immune system.

herbs.name: Aloe Vera
advantages: Has soothing effects on the skin and digestive tract.
May help with skin conditions, digestive issues, and support hydration.

herbs.name: Burdock Root
advantages: Supports liver and kidney function.
Can help with skin conditions and detoxification.

herbs.name: Chicory
advantages: Supports liver health and digestion.
May help with appetite regulation and reducing inflammation.
